paper.title: A zero-knowledge poker protocol that achieves confidentiality of the players' strategy or How to achieve an electronic poker face
paper.abstract: Many attempts have been previously made to achieve a protocol that would allow people to play mental poker [SRA, GM1, BF, FM, Yu, Cr] (I would rather say electronic poker). But no solution has ever come close to reality with respect to poker strategy. Poker players usually claim that luck has nothing to do with their gains. In fact, poker is a very strategic game. Often, an inexperienced player will loose a lot of money when playing against an experienced player, only because the former cannot hide so easily his emotions. The experienced player can easily know whether his opponent has a good hand or not.
